p: Taken together, this evidence clearly describes synthetic drug-using MSM as a dual-risk key population in China that is very vulnerable to HIV infection. While relatively new to China, the combination of synthetic drug use and high-risk sexual behavior by MSM is not new globally [ 11], and in fact, has become so common that it has been given names: “party-and-play” in North America and Australia, and “chemsex” in the remainder of the West as well as parts of southern Asia and central Europe [ 9, 10]. Well-documented on four continents [ 5– 8], synthetic drug use and high-risk sexual behavior has been consistently linked with HIV infection in MSM communities and is a serious global public health problem.
